title: Blood Drive
subtitle: 10:00 AM · St. Rose Auditorium
body: Community blood drive at St. Rose Auditorium.

title: Adoration + Confession (St. Rose)
subtitle: 5:00 PM · St. Rose
body: Eucharistic Adoration with Confession at St. Rose.

title: 24-hour 1st Friday Adoration Begins (St. Patrick)
subtitle: 6:00 PM · St. Patrick Church
body: Adoration begins Thursday evening and continues through Friday. See the schedule for Children’s Adoration, Benediction, and conclusion time.

title: Adoration Continues + Children’s Adoration + Benediction
subtitle: Children’s Adoration until 4:00 PM · Benediction 5:55 PM · St. Patrick
body: Adoration continues. Children’s Adoration is until 4:00 PM. Benediction is at 5:55 PM.

title: First Saturday Marian Devotion
subtitle: 7:30–9:00 AM · St. Rose of Lima Church

title: Baptism Prep Class (English)
subtitle: 7:00 PM · St. Rose Auditorium · MUST RSVP
body: Parents and (local) Godparents are expected to attend a 90-minute class prior to setting a date for baptism. MUST RSVP. Call the parish office to sign up.

title: Coffee & Donuts
subtitle: 9:15 AM · St. Rose Auditorium
body: Coffee & donuts in the St. Rose Auditorium after Mass-time activities. All are welcome.

title: Prayers for Seminarians
subtitle: 3:00 PM · St. Patrick Church
body: Join for prayers for seminarians at St. Patrick Church.

title: No Confirmation or Youth Group
subtitle: Sunday, Dec 28
body: No Confirmation or Youth Group this weekend.

title: No Confirmation or Youth Group
subtitle: Sunday, Jan 4
body: No Confirmation or Youth Group this weekend.

title: Knights of Columbus Free-Throw Competition
subtitle: 5:00–7:00 PM · Parish Center at St. Patrick
body: For boys and girls ages 9–14. Entry forms available at the back of each church; walk-ins welcome. Parental permission required. Parents are encouraged to stay. Call area coordinator Dennis Redburn: 620-617-2198.

title: Back to School
subtitle: Jan 5 · Holy Family School
body: Back to school on January 5 after Christmas Break.

title: Girls Night Out (multi-day)
subtitle: Fri–Sun, Jan 7–9 · 3600 Broadway
body: Girls Night Out. Game night at 3600 Broadway. (Listed as Jan 7–9.)

title: Diocese of Dodge City: Pilgrimage for Life
subtitle: Jan 31, 2026 · Cathedral of Our Lady of Guadalupe (Social Hall)
body: Schedule: 10:00 AM gather for prayer & presentation (Kansas Catholic Conference). 10:45 AM outdoor pilgrimage begins. 11:45 AM prepare for liturgy. 12:00 PM Holy Mass. 1:00 PM lunch + ministry fair. Bring a non-food pantry item (diapers, wipes, toiletries) for Catholic Charities. Register or call the Diocese: 620-227-1500.

title: Baptism Preparation Classes (Ongoing)
subtitle: English: First Saturday 7:00 PM · Spanish: Last Saturday 6:30 PM · St. Rose Auditorium
body: Parents and (local) Godparents are expected to attend a 90-minute class prior to setting a baptism date. MUST RSVP. Call the parish office to sign up.

title: Diocesan Calendars Available
subtitle: Available in the back of each church (while supplies last)
body: 75th Anniversary diocesan calendars are available at the back of each church while supplies last.
